text: ssp is a provider of software solutions
to the insurance market typically
general insurance or PNC our business
strategy is to make it easy for our
customers to connect with their
customers as in the insurance market
changes then if it's easy for our
customers to connect with their
customers through the technology we
provide then obviously they're providing
a better service to their customers we
saw that our clients wanted to consume
software and services from us more on a
metered basis on a pay-as-you-go basis
and the days of having large insurance
software subscription fees or perhaps
declining so we needed to move to more
of an on-demand
model in both in the way we deliver our
software and the way we support it we
see a huge number of insurance quotes
flowing through our environment and we
wanted to start to gather those and
start to create capabilities on top of
that and we just couldn't do that in our
environment we couldn't physically store
that amount of data and so what we are
doing as part of our evolution is to
migrate those solutions into a SS into a
native AWS solution that will have
components that will still run on
Windows but also adopt new capabilities
that are afforded to us by our
partnership with AWS so in breaking out
the kind of traditional monolith
solution into components we're have
identified that we can provide micro
services using you know the
containerization so whether it be ec2 or
whether it be bar gates to provide a
componentized solution as well as you
know using more traditional hosting for
all kind of more windows elements in the
middle so the policy administration
piece we've used the vehm bridge as a
mechanism to transport messages around
the environment our services encounter
peaks and troughs during any day where
the peak may be a hundred or more times
that of the trough and clearly what we
want to do is only scale our systems and
pay cost out of our business
for the volumes that are flowing through
being on AWS having elastic
infrastructure and laterally scalable
applications means that those
applications can just breathe as they
need to as demand hits them and then
scale down again as the demand falls
away we are saving a lot of cash in our
business in fact we're saving on any
year many millions of dollars it opens
up for us new areas of innovation for us
new areas of innovation for our clients
that was previously unavailable
essentially it's moving SSP from a
company that would have been thought of
as a leading but fairly traditional
software product provider into a company
that gives you software but actually
gives you insight into your business and
data about your business and
understanding about your business that
you've never had before and that's
massive for us in terms of a change
you
